channel.title: New to the community
channel.description:
Hey guys , I'm new to the community , but I'm trying to find a team that will make and run a great rsps server. I personally believe its 50% material and 50% community that runs a server, so that being said.
I'm looking for a -coder (the source and client is a 317) -1 admin , who can play quite a bit daily. ( to keep everything under control) -Client/coder Someone whos good with portforwarding and creating a downloadable file -2 mods who can host events and play more than 4 hours daily
I'm not sure if I wrote in the right format , but I'm hoping to find a successful staff. :)

item.title: New to the community
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

You need more info, and requesting all of these things won’t be beneficial to your server at all.

Read full topic

item.title: New to the community
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I realise you’re knew and everything, but this really needs more effort.

Take a look at the more popular threads and mimic their formatting.

Read full topic

item.title: New to the community
item.dc:creator: @hammy846 hammy846
item.description:
@hammy846 wrote:

Hey guys , I’m new to the community , but I’m trying to find a team that will make and run a great rsps server. I personally believe its 50% material and 50% community that runs a server, so that being said.

I’m looking for a
-coder (the source and client is a 317)
-1 admin , who can play quite a bit daily. ( to keep everything under control)
-Client/coder Someone whos good with portforwarding and creating a downloadable file
-2 mods who can host events and play more than 4 hours daily

I’m not sure if I wrote in the right format , but I’m hoping to find a successful staff.
